divs: Sighting DetailsMY FRIEND AND I WERE SITTING BY THE POOL AREA IN LONG POOL CHAIRS AT THE WYNN CASINO LOOKING AT THE SKY AS WE WERE WAITING TO GO TO THE AIRPORT TO CATCH FLIGHT THAT LEFT AT 11PM. I WAS LOOKING UP AND THOUGHT I SAW A SHOOTING STAR THEN I LOOK TO THE RIGHT AND SAW THIS RED LIGHT DANCING IN THE SKY AND THE MOVES THAT IT WAS DOING WERE UNBELIEVABLE. IT WOULD BASICALLY ZIG ZAG UP DOWN ALL AROUND INSTANTLY LEAVING SOME TYPE OF TRAIL BEHIND IT . I GOT OUT MY CAMERA AND TOOK VIDEO AND MY FRIEND WAS ABLE TO SNAP SOME STILL PHOTOS. I WAS IN AMAZEMENT AND WISH I HAD A BETTER CAMERA. I LOST SIGHT WHEN A COMMERCIAL PLANE FLEW BY OVER HEAD WHICH WAS LANDING AT THE AIRPORT CLOSE BY.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around May 26th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Red light making rapid change in direction over Las Vegas.
